channel.title: Star Wars FM: v1 - Setup Creation/Design
channel.description:
# Welcome to Star Wars FM: v1 Hosted by @KyoDaz -
This setup follows simple forum rules; 1. [https://toli.es/rules ](https://toli.es/rules) 2. [Official Forum Mafia and Forum of Lies Rules](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926/) The setup will start once 30 players have signed up. **Gameplay** Days will be 48 hours long, or shorter if someone is jettisoned. Nights will be 24 hours long or until everyone has submitted their actions. Actions are done by messaging me. Any masonries will talk through a forum PM or discord server. Evils & neutrals will be given flavor safeclaims. Flavor may not be entirely accurate. **Executions** To jettison someone say “**/jettison [player]**” or “**/vote [player]**” There will be a day one jettison. Executions end the day. Executions will be plurality and majority. **After The Night** Only investigative abilities will return feedback and be informed upon occupation and redirection. They will not know whom they were redirected to. **To Join** To join, please ‘**/in**’ Alternate accounts will not be allowed. **Role List** This setup is closed. However, a majority of players will be a Jedi Padawan. **Role Cards** [details="Jedi Padawan"] >![image|360x450](upload://8UESTS4VPY2nbq7Dcg88KJUtmlI.jpeg) > # [color=green]Jedi Padawan[/color] > **[color=green]Jedi Padawan[/color]** > > **Jedi Padawan Lightsaber Duelist** **([color=gold]Special[/color] - Passive)** - You are a Jedi Padawan Lightsaber Duelist. >**Trained ([color=green]Light Side of the Force[/color] - Passive)** - You gain a random basic [color=green]Light Side of the Force[/color] or [color=grey]Both Sides of the Force[/color] ability with two uses. > > *Defeat all threats to the Jedi.* |Defence |Attack| |---|---| |+ 0% |- 0%| [/details] Players: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 7. 8. 9. Backups: 1. 2. 3. Spectators: 1. 2. 3. Rolelist -

item.title: Star Wars FM: v1 - Setup Creation/Design
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Basically, four people could join and attack a single player.
I forgot the formula for it but it’d take like, (50% + {defence of player being attacked} - {highest attack of person attacking}) / {number of players attacking}

and then their counterattack would be {player being attacked’s attack} / {number of players attacking them}
and run that ITA chance for every player attacking

Simulation: Palpatine vs Quinlan, Asajj, Anakin + Luminara

Palpatine’s chance of surviving: 100 - (5 + 20 + 25 + 5) = 45 / 4
11.25% chance of surviving

Quinlan’s chance of dying: 50 + 25 = (75 - 30) / 4
11.25% chance of dying

Read full topic

item.title: Star Wars FM: v1 - Setup Creation/Design
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
image500×667 114 KB

Asajj Ventress

Sith Assassin

Partnered (Special - Passive) - You are in a masonry with Quinlan Vos. Any votes for you to become Supreme Chancellor will be negated. You both leave the game after your win condition has been achieved.
Master Double-Bladed Lightsaber Duelist (Special - Passive) - You are a Master Double-Bladed Lightsaber Duelist. Your attack and defence stat mirror eachother for whichever would be highest.
Force Lighting (Dark Side of the Force - Day) - Occupy a player. - 2 uses
Force Crush (Dark Side of the Force - Day) - Bleed a player. - 2 uses
Force Choke (Dark Side of the Force - Night) - Occupy a player. - 2 uses
Force Drain (Dark Side of the Force - Night) - Prevent a player being healed tonight. - 2 uses
Assassinate (Special - Night) - Kill a player if they are a Jedi, Clonetrooper or Rebel. - 2 uses

Ensure Darth Sidious and all Jedi Masters except Quinlan Voss die.

Defence Attack
+ 20% - 20%

image500×633 87.8 KB

Quinlan Voss

Jedi Master

Partnered (Special - Passive) - You are in a masonry with Asajj Ventress. Any votes for you to become Supreme Chancellor will be negated. You both leave the game after your win condition has been achieved.
Master Lightsaber Duelist (Special - Passive) - You are a Master Lightsaber Duelist.
Force Valor (Light Side of the Force - Day) - Gain 5% better attack in duels. - 2 uses
Force Sense (Light Side of the Force - Day) - Gain 10% better defence in duels. - 2 uses
Force Heal (Light Side of the Force - Night) - Heal a player. - 2 uses
Force Light (Light Side of the Force - Night) - Learn who visits your target. - 2 uses
Apprehend (Special - Night) - Select a player. If they have a Dark Side of the Force
ability, publicly reveal it in the morning. - 2 uses

Ensure Darth Sidious and all Jedi Masters except Quinlan Voss die.

Defence Attack
+ 30% - 5%

Read full topic
item.source: Star Wars FM: v1 - Setup Creation/Design

item.title: Star Wars FM: v1 - Setup Creation/Design
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Princess Leia

Rebel Leader

Carrie Fisher (Special - Passive) - Your entire classcard is golden.
Determined (Special - Passive) - You will consume a usage of Blaster Shot per player to stop your death in Lightsaber Battles. If you run out of shots and are attacked you are guaranteed to die.
Rebel Alliance Leader (Special - Passive) - Any votes for you to become a member of the Jedi Council will be negated. Any votes for you to become Supreme Chancellor will be negated.
Blaster Shot (Special - Day) - Silently vig a player during the day. - 4 uses

Defeat all threats to the Rebels.

Read full topic
item.source: Star Wars FM: v1 - Setup Creation/Design

item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
image500×625 102 KB

Anakin Skywalker

Jedi Master

Exiled (Special - Passive) - Any votes for you to become a member of the Jedi Council will be negated. Any votes for you to become Supreme Chancellor will be negated.
Master Lightsaber Duelist (Special - Passive) - You are a Master Lightsaber Duelist.
Force Lighting (Dark Side of the Force - Day) - Occupy a player. - 2 uses
Force Crush (Dark Side of the Force - Day) - Bleed a player. - 2 uses
Force Choke (Dark Side of the Force - Night) - Occupy a player. - 2 uses
Force Drain (Dark Side of the Force - Night) - Prevent a player being healed tonight. - 2 uses
Inspire (Special - Night) - Empower every basic force ability being used tonight. - 1 use

Defeat all threats to the Jedi.

Defence Attack
+ 5% - 25%

Read full topic

Luminara Unduli

Jedi Master

Obligation (Special - Passive) - Any votes for you to become Supreme Chancellor will be negated.
Master Lightsaber Duelist (Special - Passive) - You are a Master Lightsaber Duelist.
Force Valor (Light Side of the Force - Day) - Gain 5% better attack in duels. - 2 uses
Force Sense (Light Side of the Force - Day) - Gain 10% better defence in duels. - 2 uses
Force Heal (Light Side of the Force - Night) - Heal a player. - 2 uses
Force Light (Light Side of the Force - Night) - Learn who visits your target. - 2 uses
Mass Heal (Special - Night) - Heal every player, including yourself tonight. - 1 use

Defeat all threats to the Jedi.

Defence Attack
+ 25% - 5%

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Jedi Padawan

Jedi Padawan

Jedi Padawan Lightsaber Duelist (Special - Passive) - You are a Jedi Padawan Lightsaber Duelist.
Trained (Light Side of the Force - Passive) - You gain a random basic Light Side of the Force or Both Sides of the Force ability with two uses.

Defeat all threats to the Jedi.

Defence Attack
+ 0% - 0%

Read full topic
item.source: Star Wars FM: v1 - Setup Creation/Design

item.title: Star Wars FM: v1 - Setup Creation/Design
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
image640×640 112 KB

Recon Clone Trooper

Clonetrooper

Clonetrooper (Light Side of the Force - Passive) - You are in a masonry with other clonetroopers. You cannot be elected to the Jedi Council or Supreme Chancellor. Any Lightsaber Battles targeting you will be guaranteed to kill you.
Active Orders (Special - Passive) - Current Active Orders; violating an order will strongman kill you.

  • Order 99 - All clonetroopers must refrain from claiming or softing a masonry, greencheck or otherwise knowing other clonetroopers’ alignments.
  • Order 98 - All clonetroopers must refrain from targeting eachother.
  • Order 97 - All clonetroopers must refrain from engaging the enemy.
  • Order 96 - All clonetroopers must refrain from targeting the same player twice.

Scout (Both Sides of the Force - Day) - Track a player. - 2 uses

Defeat all threats to the Clonetroopers.

Read full topic

item.title: Star Wars FM: v1 - Setup Creation/Design
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Clone Trooper Commander

Clonetrooper

Clonetrooper (Light Side of the Force - Passive) - You are in a masonry with other clonetroopers. You cannot be elected to the Jedi Council or Supreme Chancellor. Any Lightsaber Battles targeting you will be guaranteed to kill you.
Active Orders (Special - Passive) - Current Active Orders; violating an order will strongman kill you.

  • Order 99 - All clonetroopers must refrain from claiming or softing a masonry, greencheck or otherwise knowing other clonetroopers’ alignments.
  • Order 98 - All clonetroopers must refrain from targeting eachother.
  • Order 97 - All clonetroopers must refrain from engaging the enemy.
  • Order 96 - All clonetroopers must refrain from targeting the same player twice.

Clone Commander (Special - Passive) - You are a Clonetrooper Commander. Any clonetrooper targeting you with an ITA will always fail. You may issue commands every night.
Remove Order (Both Sides of the Force - Day) - Remove an order. Orders in red cannot be removed. - 3 uses

Defeat all threats to the Clonetroopers.

Read full topic
item.source: Star Wars FM: v1 - Setup Creation/Design

item.title: Star Wars FM: v1 - Setup Creation/Design
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Mace Windu

Jedi Master

Destined (Special - Passive) - You are guaranteed a position on the Jedi Council. Any votes for you to become Supreme Chancellor are zero.
Jedi Master Vapaad Lightsaber Duelist (Special - Passive) - You are a Jedi Master Draining Lightsaber Duelist. Your attack and defence stat is ineffected by the fraction penalty being attacked by multiple users.
"Too Dangerous To Be Left Alive" (Special - Night) - Target a player. If they are a member of the Sith, kill them. - 1 use
Force Barrier (Both Sides of the Force - Day) - Gain immunity to abilities today. - 2 uses
Force Jump (Both Sides of the Force - Day) - Mimic day abilities used on your target. - 2 uses
Force Wave (Both Sides of the Force - Night) - Prevent abilities on your target. - 2 uses
Force Persuasion (Both Sides of the Force - Night) - Redirect a player to another. - 2 uses

Defeat all threats to the Jedi.

Defence Attack
+ 20% - 15%

Read full topic
item.source: Star Wars FM: v1 - Setup Creation/Design

item.title: Star Wars FM: v1 - Setup Creation/Design
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Unfortunately while the current Supreme Chancellor and the entire Jedi Council of the Galactic Empire walked down some stairs they all fell. And died.

Elections for Supreme Chancellor and Jedi Council of the Galactic Empire has started.

Supreme Chancellor

There is one Supreme Chancellor.
The Supreme Chancellor will have access to ‘The Senate’ chat, and ‘Governing Body’ chat.
The Supreme Chancellor will become a triple-voter.
The Supreme Chancellor, upon election, chooses two players to add to their ‘The Senate’ chat.
Members of the Senate are publicly announced.
All votes towards the Supreme Chancellor are halved except votes from the Jedi Council.
If the current Supreme Chancellor dies with equal to or more than 15 players alive, a new election will be held…

If died during the day; the next day
If died during the night; the start of the day

The Jedi Council of the Galactic Empire

There are four members of the Jedi Council of the Galactic Empire.
Members of the Jedi Council will have access to the ‘Governing Body’ chat and ‘Jedi Council’ chat.
If two members of the Jedi Council die, an election will be held to replace the members…

If died during the day; the next day
If died during the night; the start of the day

Neighborhoods

The Senate Chat is a day and night chat.
The Governing Body Chat is a day only chat.
The Jedi Council Chat is a night only chat.

Special Mechanics

  • At any time, the majority of the Jedi Council may decide to usurp the Supreme Chancellor. This ability is a guaranteed and announced night kill on the Supreme Chancellor. It cannot fail by any means.
  • There is one role that is guaranteed a position in the Jedi Council; therefore you may only vote three people for the position of Jedi Council.
  • If a player is elected into both Supreme Chancellor and Jedi Council, the Jedi Council becomes disbanded.

Read full topic
item.source: Star Wars FM: v1 - Setup Creation/Design

item.title: Star Wars FM: v1 - Setup Creation/Design
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
image653×816 146 KB

Darth Maul

Sith Apprentice

Apprentice (Dark Side of the Force - Passive) - You may select a force ability to learn every night Darth Sidious is alive.
Lightsaber Stab (Both Sides of the Force - Night) - Kill a player.

Gain parity over or defeat the Jedi, Clonetroopers, Rebels and anyone else who opposes you.

Defence Attack
+ 5% - 5%

Read full topic
